slogan.mission: Database change for DevOps and DBA teams
slogan.database-devops-best-practice: The Database DevOps Best Practice {br}from Google.
slogan.better-way: Bytebase is not a better tool to manage database changes. It's a better way to manage database changes.

banner.announce-bytebase-1-0-and-our-team-plan: Announce Bytebase 1.0 and our Team Plan
banner.database-ci-cd-with-github: Database CI/CD Best Practice with GitHub
banner.cncf-landscape: CNCF Landscape includes Bytebase as the first-ever database CI/CD solution

subscribe.learn-product-updates-and-everything-abo: Learn product updates and database insight.
subscribe.email-subscription-success-message: You've successfully subscribed to our newsletter.

bio.tianzhou: Tianzhou was the TL of Google Cloud SQL and the maintainer of Google's internal PostgreSQL and MySQL branch. He later joined Ant Group, where he was the head of Database/DevTools/Collaboration group and served as the chair of the company's coding committee.
bio.danny: Danny was the Staff Engineer at Google Cloud and TL overseeing Cloud SQL and API & Service Infrastructure. He has won Google's highest engineering award twice.

index-page.title: {slogan} {br}Database {br}CI/CD for {br}{developers}
index-page.accelerate-software-release: Accelerate software release by adopting database CI/CD

review-board.title: Review Board
review-board.description: All-in-one SQL review board to provide a holistic view of the database change.

gitops.title: GitOps Workflow
gitops.description: Point-and-click GitHub and GitLab integration to enable GitOps workflow for changing database.

tenant-mode.title: Multi-Tenant Rollout
tenant-mode.description: Help SaaS provider to manage database changes across all tenants.

sql-review.title: SQL Review Lint
sql-review.description: Automatically check SQL anti-patterns. Also available as GitHub Action and API.

all-in-one-sql-editor.title: All-in-one SQL Editor
all-in-one-sql-editor.description: Inspect records, explore schema, sharing SQL scripts, and more.

a-complete-rethink-to-deliver-experience.title: A complete rethink to {deliver-experience}
a-complete-rethink-to-deliver-experience.description: From the data modeling, to the tech stack, system architecture and then the final user interface, Bytebase is engineered from the ground up to deliver a transforming user experience to the DBAs and Developers.

modern-collaborative-dev-tool.title: Modern collaborative dev tool
modern-collaborative-dev-tool.description: Bytebase aspires to tools like {links}. We want to be the most favorable tool among Developers and DBAs for managing database schemas.

plug-and-play.title: Plug-and-Play
plug-and-play.description: Bytebase provides a comprehensive web console requiring zero config and external dependency. Developers and DBAs can focus on their database tasks right away.

usability.title: Usability
usability.description: As a professional tool for managing application's most critical asset - transactional database schema, Bytebase thinks deeply to surface the relevant info, design the proper ergonomics. Conducting schema changes is always scary, we want to eliminate the risk of misfire caused by the {confusing-interface}.

extensibility.title: Extensibility
extensibility.description: Being one of the infrastructure toolkit, Bytebase will provide hooks to integrate with existing IM, CI/CD, issue tracking, monitoring, login systems.

single-binary-with-curated-tech-stack.title: Single binary with curated tech stack
single-binary-with-curated-tech-stack.description: The entire app is bundled in {a-single-binary} and started via {bytebase-link}. As a professional tool, Bytebase tries to be pragmatic. And because Bytebase is open sourced, it favors technologies with simplicity and being opinionated to deliver an accessible and cohesive experience to easily learn, use and build the product. We don't want people to waste time figuring out how to deploy or arguing the better coding styles.

tech-stacks.vue-feature: {vue-link} is a progressive framework and {tailwindcss-link} is a utility-first CSS framework. Together with the build tool {vite-link} and {typescript-link}, they offer a significantly improved frontend development experience.
tech-stacks.golang-feature: 's static linking + embedding allows Bytebase to deliver a binary with single-line command to launch both the frontend and backend without requiring extra dependency (no docker, docker-compose, kubernetes). And we never need to debate the coding style.
tech-stacks.postgresql-feature: is the industry leading multi-model relational database. In addition to the typical transactional workload, PostgreSQL can also handle analytical, geospatial, time series, full text search and etc. This allows Bytebase to only keep a single database system to fulfill all sorts of requirements.

database.clickhouse-feature: is an open-source, high performance columnar OLAP database management system for real-time analytics using SQL.
database.mysql-feature: is the world's most popular open source database. Bytebase supports MySQL database natively to manage schema changes, backups, record migration history and etc.
database.postgre-feature: is the world's most advanced open source relational database. Bytebase supports PostgreSQL database natively to manage schema changes, backups, record migration history and etc.
database.snowflake-feature: is a cloud-based data storage and analytics service. It allows corporate users to store and analyze data using cloud-based hardware and software.
database.tidb-feature: is an open-source, cloud-native, distributed SQL database for elastic scale and real-time analytics. Bytebase supports TiDB database natively to manage schema changes, backups, record migration history and etc.

sql-review-guide.title: SQL Review Guide
sql-review-guide.description: An online tool for DBA to generate the SQL review / DDL guideline.

bb-sql-review-prod.desc: Comprehensive policy where you have total protection and best practices for your databases.
bb-sql-review-prod.title: Database Review Guide

bb-sql-review-dev.desc: Basic coverage to defend your databases from common misusage.
bb-sql-review-dev.title: Database Review Guide

sql-review-guide.input-then-press-enter: Input the value then press enter to add

integration.dingtalk-feature: Bytebase supports webhook to post database schema related events to the configured DingTalk group. Those webhook events are specifically customized for DingTalk in order to display the optimal format.
integration.discord-feature: Bytebase supports webhook to post database schema related events to the configured Discord channel. Those webhook events are specifically customized for Discord in order to display the optimal format.
integration.feishu-feature: Bytebase supports webhook to post database schema related events to the configured Feishu group. Those webhook events are specifically customized for Feishu in order to display the optimal format.
integration.gitlab-feature: Bytebase integrates with GitLab to allow team to manage database migration scripts in the GitLab repository. Migration pipeline is triggered on observing new migration script push event.
integration.github-feature: Bytebase integrates with GitHub to allow team to manage database migration scripts in the GitHub repository. Migration pipeline is triggered on observing new migration script push event.
integration.slack-feature: Bytebase supports webhook to post database schema related events to the configured Slack channel. Those webhook events are specifically customized for Slack in order to display the optimal format.
integration.teams-feature: Bytebase supports webhook to post database schema related events to the configured Microsoft Teams channel. Those webhook events are specifically customized for Teams in order to display the optimal format.
integration.wecom-feature: Bytebase supports webhook to post database schema related events to the configured WeCom group. Those webhook events are specifically customized for WeCom in order to display the optimal format.

refund.title: Refund policy
refund.description: We try to deliver a product valuable to your business and delightful to use. If you're ever unhappy with it for any reason, just contact our {support-team} and we'll take care of you.

dba.title: 10x DBA operational efficiency
dba.description: Bytebase provides a collaborative web-console and cohensive workflow to allow DBA to manage database tasks and handle developer tickets much more efficently than traditonal tools.

developer.title: Holistic view of database schema changes
developer.description: Regardless of working as an IC in a team or managing your own side project, developers using Bytebase will have a holistic view of all the related database info, the ongoing database schema change tasks and the past database migration history.

techlead.title: Improve team velocity and reduce risk
techlead.description: Teams using Bytebase will automatically follow industry best practice for managing database schema changes. Tech leads will see an improved development velocity and reduced outages caused by database changes.

about.why-we-build: While we have a plethora of commercial and open-source database engines serving billions of users, our tooling around making {reliable} {consistent} {auditable} application database schema changes is embarrassing. And today many teams are still connecting to the production DB and applying changes directly. Quick and dirty, until BOMB!
about.there-is-no-good-answer: There was no really good answer.
about.porsche-example: It's like a Porsche with a good engine, but only paired with the handy wheel and brake, can it deliver a safe and pleasant driving experience. And that's what {bytebase} tries to achieve, to pair the database engine with the proper wheel and brake to improve the development velocity and experience.

past-company.built-by: Built by engineers knowing database development flow

demo.book-success-description: We will contact you in 1 business day.
